gameDetails.name: Black Orchestra: Conspirator Pack #1
gameDetails.description:
Conspirator Pack #1 includes all 3 conspirators from the 1st Edition's Classified Pack, but have been updated for the new edition. There is also a new 4th conspirator.

- above description from publisher

Includes:

Fabian Von Schlabrendorff - Wehrmacht - Adjutant to Colonel Tresckow
Hjalmar Schacht - Civilian - President Reichsbank
Hans Gisevius - Abwehr - Diplomat and Abwehr agent
  plus
Sophie Scholl - Civilian - Student activist
